actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employment for not in excess of 10 hours in any 1 day or  4 days in any 1 week.

summary.text: Amends the Walsh-Healey Act to permit government contractors to have their employees work ten-hour workdays if the workweek of such employees does not exceed four days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Walsh-Healey Act to permit employment for not in excess of 10 hours in any 1 day or  4 days in any 1 week.
